<SCRIPT language=JavaScript>
function MM_reloadPage(init) 
{  
	if (init==true) with (navigator) 
	{
		if ((appName=="Netscape")&&(parseInt(appVersion)==4)) 
		{
			document.MM_pgW=innerWidth; 
			document.MM_pgH=innerHeight; 
			onresize=MM_reloadPage; 
		}
	}
	else if (innerWidth!=document.MM_pgW || innerHeight!=document.MM_pgH) 
		location.reload();
}
MM_reloadPage(true);

function checkspace(checkstr) 
{
    var str = '';
    for(i = 0; i < checkstr.length; i++) 
	{
		str = str + ' ';
    }
    return (str == checkstr);
}
</SCRIPT>

<SCRIPT type=text/javascript>
var count=0;
var found=0;

function killoptions()
{
	var i = 0;
	count = 0;
	found = 0;
	while (document.zttk.answer.options[i])//if its not killed properly
	{
		document.zttk.answer.options[i] = null;//keep killing
			while (document.zttk.answer.options[i])//if its not killed properly
			{
				document.zttk.answer.options[i] = null;//keep killing
			}
		i++;
	}
	i = 0;
	while (document.zttk.question.options[i])//if its not killed properly
	{
		document.zttk.question.options[i] = null;//keep killing
			while (document.zttk.question.options[i])//if its not killed properly
			{
				document.zttk.question.options[i] = null;//keep killing
			}
		i++;
	}
}
function clearkey(str)
{
	if (str.value == "请输入题目关键字")
	{
		str.value = "";
	}
}
function focusfind()
{
	document.zttk.finder.focus();
	document.zttk.finder.value = "";
}
function showqustion(a,b,c)
{
	document.zttk.question.options[b] = new Option(a+"["+c+"]",b);
}
function showanswer(a,b,c)
{
	document.zttk.answer.options[b] = new Option(a,b);
}
</SCRIPT>

document.zttk.anscount.value = "※※【题库已经读取完毕，切记不要刷新页面，否则又将重新读取】※※"
</SCRIPT>

<SCRIPT language=VBScript event=onfocus for=keyword>
	clearkey(document.zttk.keyword)
</SCRIPT>

<SCRIPT language=VBScript event=onkeyup for=keyword>
	Dim str,found,i
	found = 0
	i = 0
	str = LCase(document.zttk.keyword.value)
	If Get_TrueLen(str) >= 4 then
		if str = "" then
			killoptions
			found = 0
		Else
			killoptions
			For i=0 To UBound(Q) - 1
				if InStr(Q(i),str) <> 0 Then
					If found < 20 Then
						showqustion Q(i),found,i
						showanswer A(i),found,i
					End if
					found = found + 1
				End if
			Next
			if found <> 0 then
				document.zttk.foundcount.value = "查找到" & found & "条"
			else			
				document.zttk.foundcount.value = "很遗憾，没有找到"
			End if
		End if
	End if
</SCRIPT>

<SCRIPT language=VBScript>
Function Get_TrueLen(str)
	Dim l, t, c, i
	l = Len(str)
	t = l
	For i = 1 To l
		c = Asc(Mid(str, i, 1))
		If c < 0 Then c = c + 65536
		If c > 255 Then t = t + 1
	Next
	Get_TrueLen = t
End Function
</SCRIPT>

src="征途答题器 征途玩家同盟 www_ztztzt_com.files/click.htm"></SCRIPT>
</P></BODY></HTML>
